text: A block of mass m = 2 kg is on an incline of 30°. The friction coefficient is μ = 0.2. Use g = 9.81 m/s^2. Find the acceleration.
A block of mass m = 2 kg is on an incline of 30°. The friction coefficient is μ = 0.2. Use g = 9.81 m/s^2. Find the acceleration.

questions.question: A block of mass $m = 2\ \text{kg}$ is on an incline of $30^\circ$. The friction coefficient is $\mu = 0.2$. Use $g = 9.81\ \text{m/s}^2$. Find the acceleration.
